CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 32 Here , we synthesized low band - gap copolymers incorporating 9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene ( TA ) and DPP as an electron - donating and electron - withdrawing unit , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. 9,10-bis (5-(2-ethylhexyl)thiophen-2-yl)anthracene (TA)
2. DPP (no further information is provided about the name of this entity)

Therefore, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. TA
2. DPP
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. TA

The other entities in the paragraph are not Material Names, so I have removed them:

Revised paragraph:

32 Here , we synthesized low band - gap copolymers incorporating TA and DPP as an electron - donating and electron - withdrawing unit , respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TA |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
